message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price, considering the value it brings to your business.
Thanks Alice, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $12000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 is your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
